title: Adobe Photoshop CC.v14.0.Final.Multilang - Team Rjaa
description:
0. - Disable internet.

1. - Install the program in trial mode, and press "Log later", do not start.

Two. - Copy the contents of the folder "Patch" on:

32-bit: C:  Program Files  Adobe  Adobe Photoshop DC
64-bit: C:  Program Files  Adobe  Adobe Photoshop CC (64 Bit)

Three. - Run the patch (32-bit or 64-bit) for your operating system (as admin in Vista/7/8), press "patch".

April. - Run "" (as admin in Vista/7/8).

May. - Start the program. It is recommended to lock in more security firewall.



Ready!!


PD. Instead of using the patch, you can copy the libraries cracked (folder "amdlib", used by operating system 32bit/64bit) en route:

32-bit: C:  Program Files  Adobe  Adobe Photoshop DC
64-bit: C:  Program Files  Adobe  Adobe Photoshop CC (64 Bit)
